unnormalised: Guys, have you checked out the PM Poshan scheme? Heard it's helping kids in govt. schools get a proper midday meal. Also, RTE Act ensures free & compulsory education till class 8. My cousin, Aisha, is a teacher & says these schemes have improved attendance by like, 20% in her school! Imagine, more kids getting an education thanks to schemes like these. More info on the MHRD website, probably. Worth a look!
normalised: Guys, have you checked out the P-M Poshan scheme? Heard it is helping kids in government schools get a proper midday meal. Also, R-T-E Act ensures free and compulsory education till class eight. My cousin, Aisha, is a teacher and says these schemes have improved attendance by like, twenty percent in her school! Imagine, more kids getting an education thanks to schemes like these. More info on the M-H-R-D website, probably. Worth a look!
